|brand = D-Link |model = DIR-882 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = A1 |subrevision = (US) |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 07/27/2017 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/D-Link_DIR-882_rev_A1 |wlclass = AC2600 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = wireless router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = KA2IR882A1 |icid = 4216A-IR882A1 |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = AP-MTKH7 |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = MediaTek;MT7621AT;MT7621AT, 1751-AMTH, CTPH0Y93, DTPGXM46; |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = MIPS 1004Kc |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 880 <!-- 880 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = 16-bit
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Macronix;MX25L12805D; |flash1size = 16 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 128 |ram1chip = Nanya;NT5CC64M16GP-DI; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw_cpu = true |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 18:0F:76 |oui = 18:0F:76
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;1.1.3;Ralink 5.0.0.0; |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = USB 3.0, USB 2.0 |exp_usb_num = 2 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 2.5 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 4-pin header,, |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = MU-MIMO, 256QAM, |addchip = 5GHz RF FEM;Qorvo (RFMD);RFFM4552;Q, 4552, 39PF;4; |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = Admin |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = dlink-XXXX, |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = SGE (T&W) |manuf_model = AP-MTKH7 |manuf_rev = -0002 REV1.0 |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = DD-WRT, OpenWrt,
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 04/10/2017 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = 160 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = N82E16833127600 |asin = B0711TPTZL |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = MediaTek;MT7615N;ARM, MT7615N, 1634-BFSL, ACMSWLQL; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 4 |rad1rxchains = 4 |rad1sstreams = 4 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad1ac = 1733 |rad1n = 450 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 5
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = MediaTek;MT7615N;ARM, MT7615N, 1634-BFSL, ACMSWLQL; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL |rad2txchains = 4 |rad2rxchains = 4 |rad2sstreams = 4 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |nqam2 = 800 |rad2n = 450 |rad2g = 54 |rad2b = 11 |rad2freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "AP-MTKH7-0002 REV1.0" is silkscreened on the board in the [https://fccid.io/KA2IR882A1/Internal-Photos/Internal-Photo-3348918 FCC photos]. :P/N:BIR882LNAâ€¦A1, H/W Ver.:A1, F/W Ver.: XXXXXX ([https://fccid.io/KA2IR882A1/Label/Label-Sample-and-Location-Information-3348917 FCC Label])
The hardware appears to be identical to the [[D-Link DIR-878 rev A1]] :(aside from the USB ports)
*Web GUI: http://dlinkrouter.local
==Links of Interest== ===Reviews=== *[https://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/33144-d-link-dir-882-ac2600-mu-mimo-wi-fi-router-reviewed ''D-Link DIR-882 AC2600 MU-MIMO Wi-Fi Router'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] *[https://www.eteknix.com/d-link-exo-ac2600-dir-882-enthusiast-router-review/3/ ''D-Link Exo AC2600 (DIR-882) Enthusiast Router '' on '''Eteknix''']

==JTAG-Serial Info== ===Serial=== ====Serial Pinouts==== *[http://imgur.com/a/rF6a4 Picture of PCB and serial pinout] (4pin header required; flip GND and TX wires in pic [realised this when tty wouldn't respond to input])
